parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The domain name.

*   You can query one or more domain names. If you specify multiple domain names, separate them with commas (,).
*   If you leave this parameter empty, the data of all domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time granularity of the query. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   300
*   3600
*   86400

Default value: 3600.

parameters.name: SplitBy
parameters.description: The key that is used to group data. The following keys are supported: domain, region, and drm_type. If you want to specify multiple keys, separate them with commas (,). Default value: domain,region,drm_type. If you leave this parameter empty or set it to null, the returned data is not grouped.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The minimum time granularity is 5 minutes.
